title: • Home Assistant with balena and more
text: Next, we have a couple of contributions by @tmigone, the first is an article describing how to deploy Home Assistant with balena and secondly an addition to balenaDash allowing you to show photos from a USB stick and an associated article discussing hot-plugged USB devices in balenaOS.

title: • Backup Windows to External Drive
text: @janvda shared a project using rsync on a balena device to create backups of Windows (samba) shares to an external hard disk.

title: • Monitor a Raspberry Pi using Rust, Prometheus and Grafana
text: Rahul shows us how to monitor a Raspberry Pi using Rust, Prometheus and Grafana.
